alert.note: Alert for Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 2:48PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN AITKIN, NORTHWESTERN PINE AND SOUTHWESTERN CARLTON COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM CDT... At 247 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Malmo, or 16 miles east of Mille Lacs Lake, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... McGrath around 255 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. This storm may intensify. Monitor local NOAA Weather Radio, commercial radio, or television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
